title: Hypergraph Clustering Using a New Laplacian Tensor with Applications in Image Processing
abstract: In this paper, we consider the multiclass clustering problem involving a hypergraph model. Fundamentally, we study a new normalized Laplacian tensor of an even-uniform weighted hypergraph. The hype...
